sentences.en: ...the four-hundred seat mobile theatre.
sentences.cn: …拥有400个座位的活动剧场。

sentences.en: a mobile shop/library (= one inside a vehicle)
sentences.cn: 流动商店 / 图书馆

sentences.en: a more mobile workforce
sentences.cn: 具有更强流动性的劳动力

sentences.en: a prepaid mobile phone
sentences.cn: 预付话费的移动电话

sentences.en: an upwardly mobile (= moving to a higher social scale ) professional
sentences.cn: 步步高升的专业人士

sentences.en: He converted his truck into a mobile snack bar.
sentences.cn: 他把货车改成流动小吃店.

sentences.en: He forgot the charger for his mobile phone.
sentences.cn: 他忘了带手机充电器。

sentences.en: He has not been so mobile since his accident.
sentences.cn: 自从出事后他一直行动不便.

sentences.en: I'm still very mobile.
sentences.cn: 我仍然行动自如。

sentences.en: mobile air-conditioners
sentences.cn: 移动式空调器

sentences.en: Most mobile robots are still in the design stage.
sentences.cn: 大多数移动机器人仍处在设计阶段。

sentences.en: My mobile phone is extremely useful.
sentences.cn: 我的手机非常有用。

sentences.en: Our bombers have knocked out the mobile launchers.
sentences.cn: 我们的轰炸机摧毁了移动火箭发射台。

sentences.en: People these days are much more socially mobile .
sentences.cn: 如今人们的社会地位容易改变多了。

sentences.en: Please make sure all mobile phones are switched off during the performance.
sentences.cn: 请确保演出时关上所有手机。

sentences.en: Robyn had the more mobile, more expressive face.
sentences.cn: 罗宾有一张更加善变、表情更加丰富的脸。

sentences.en: She dialled 999 on her mobile.
sentences.cn: 她用手机拨打了999。

sentences.en: The mobile phone business was actually his bread and butter.
sentences.cn: 移动电话业务实际上是他的主业。

sentences.en: The mobile phone is now a must-have for children.
sentences.cn: 手机现在已经成了孩子们的必备品。

sentences.en: The old lady sits on a mobile chair every morning.
sentences.cn: 那位老妇人每天上午坐在一把可携带使用的椅子上.

sentences.en: There has been consistent growth in GSM mobile subscribers.
sentences.cn: 全球通手机用户持续增长。

words.tran_cn: 移动性；机动性；[电子] 迁移率
动员，调动；集合，组织；使…流通；使…松动

phrases.tran_cn: 中国移动通讯（世界500强之一）
动态载体；可动载流
移动式通信
笔记型电脑，移动计算机
移动吊车，移动式起重机
移动设备，移动装置；行动装置
移动设备，移动式设备
n. （拖车型）活动房屋；拖车住房
流动图书馆；图书馆车；宣传车
手机号码
（色谱分析的）流动相
手机；行动电话
动平台；可自行移动的近海钻井平台；移动式平台；流动平台
移动式无线电通信；移动无线电通信；移动式无线电台
移动式遥控装置
移动业务；手机服务
[电信]移动电台
n. 手机；移动电话；大哥大
车载设备
向更高（或更低）社会阶层流动的；获得（或失去）财富和地位的
adj. （社会、经济地位）向上升的，有上升趋势的

trans.tran_cn: 活动的，走动方便的，流动性的，易变的
trans.tran_en: not fixed in one position, and easy to move and use in different places
a decoration made of small objects tied to wires or string which is hung up so that the objects move when air blows around them
